message: Let's split it 50/50 to start, see how it goes from here!
I'll give you a small share, but I think I deserve more since I'm making the offer
That's a bit too lopsided, I'd like a fairer split. I'll try to do better next round!
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve a slightly larger share. Let's meet in the middle!
I'll give you a slightly larger share, but I still think I deserve more
Still not good enough! I think I can get a better deal if we keep negotiating.
I'm getting a bit more aggressive, but I'm still willing to compromise. Meet me in the middle, but with a slight bias towards me this time!
I'm willing to give you a slightly larger share, but I'm not going to give up my advantage yet
Still not good enough! I'm starting to think you're not serious about finding a fair split, Bob.
I'm getting serious now, Bob. I think it's time to make a move. You're not getting any younger, and I'm not getting any poorer!
I'm not going to give up yet! I'll meet you in the middle and see if we can make a deal
Alright, Bob, I'll take the 50/50 split. It's better than going home with nothing!
